description:
Nishimura Akane is always alone, teased by her classmates as the "Grim Reaper". But Takada Taiyou, a new transfer student, quickly takes an interest in her and her rumored deadly curse. Now it`s up to the new kid to shake things up in the class!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Grim Reaper and the Transfer Student
